section.name: Home
section.p: RtspProxy is a proxy server for multimedia streaming services based on the RTSP protocol.
The current version is a complete rewrite from scratch in Java of previous versions based on C++. The goal is to build a robust and scalable system usable in production environment.

The proxy is based on an asynchronous network framework,
Apache MINA , which is built on Java NIO. This framework does permit to RtspProxy to handle high loads and concurrent users.

subsection.name: 24 Oct 2005 - Released RtspProxy 3.0-ALPHA1
subsection.p: The first release of the brand new Java based RtspProxy branch has been released.

Please keep aware that this is nothing more than a "Technology Preview" to test the new proxy architecture. Implemented features are reduced to minimal. At now the proxy works for RTP over UDP streaming sessions.
